remarks: This theorem is in fact a copy of ~ wl-syl , and repeated here to demonstrate a recursive proof scheme.  The number '1' in the theorem name indicates that a chain of length 1 is modified.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 6-Jul-2019.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-impchain-mp-1.1 $e |- ( ch -> ps ) $.
wl-impchain-mp-1.2 $e |- ( ps -> ph ) $.
wl-impchain-mp-1 $p |- ( ch -> ph ) $.
